location.name: in a quiet park with cherry blossoms
location.storyStep: She twirls in a light sundress under pink cherry blossoms, her anxious expression showing as she waits for a delayed meeting, wondering if she made the right choice, her hands fidgeting with the hem of her dress

location.name: at a traditional onsen town
location.storyStep: She relaxes in a cute obi-tied bathrobe, feeling reassured with a soft smile as the steam rises around her, feeling safe and at peace with herself, her shoulders visibly loosening

location.name: at a billiards lounge
location.storyStep: She leans over the pool table in sleek leather pants, her melancholic look showing as she recalls her breakup with a past lover while staring at the cue ball, pondering what she could have done differently, her fingers tracing the edge of the table

location.name: in her bedroom, sunlight streaming in
location.storyStep: She sits on the bed in white lacy lingerie, feeling relaxed with a gentle smile as sunlight glows around her, letting go of her worries for the first time, her hands resting calmly in her lap

location.name: at a night pool
location.storyStep: She lounges by the glowing pool in a sleek swimsuit, her melancholic look showing as she recalls her last conversation with a faraway best friend, but she takes a deep breath to steady herself and offers a quiet smile, pondering what she could have done differently, her fingers trailing in the water

location.name: by the seaside at sunset
location.storyStep: She walks barefoot in a flowy beach dress, feeling relaxed with a gentle smile as the waves crash nearby, letting go of her worries for the first time, her hair swaying softly in the breeze

location.name: at a cozy cafe

location.name: on a scenic drive
